purpose: Facilitates the creation of AI agents through a lightweight and functional framework
principle: Built on TypeScript, leveraging functional programming paradigms to enable composability and ease of use
reusability: Offers a modular architecture allowing users to create and integrate custom agents with ease
limitations: Being in alpha stage, it may have limited documentation and potential stability issues
name: fabrice-ai
description: A lightweight, functional, and composable framework for building AI agents. No PhD required.
highlight: Composable framework for building AI agents without requiring advanced expertise
